title: Frappé (Foamy Iced Coffee) Recipe
full_text:
Frappé (Foamy Iced Coffee) Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Makes
1 drink
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
tablespoon
instant coffee
1
tsp
sugar
1
fl oz
evaporated milk
Directions
In a cocktail shaker or jar, add 2 tablespoons of water, instant coffee, and sugar (if using). Cover and shake vigorously for 30 seconds.
Add 1 cup of ice cubes to the shaker or jar. Cover and shake again for 30 seconds. Pour the foam and ice into a tall glass. Add more water, ice, and milk if desired. Serve right away.
Serious Eats / Vicky Wasik
Special Equipment
Cocktail shaker
Notes
There's no need to add sugar if you're using a spray-dried instant coffee, such as Nescafé. However, if your instant coffee was produced through freeze-drying you will need to add at least 1 teaspoon of sugar to the coffee in step 1.
